question_content.description:
### Problem17

Give two instructions that change the program counter (PC) to memory address 15 regardless of the contents of any registers or memory cells: 

_____(0)\___ (Begining with 'C') 

 _____(1)\___ (Begining with 'F') 

*Excerpt From Computer Science Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin. This material may be protected by copyright.*
question_content.author: Yike Guo
